That's a great plan! Reaching out to Dr. Smith can provide you with valuable insights and advice from someone who knows you and your academic background well. Don't hesitate to ask him about his thoughts on pursuing an MBA and how it might impact your career. His opinions on the current job market for MBA graduates and any connections he might have in the industry can also be incredibly helpful.

Remember to be open-minded and receptive to his feedback, even if it's not what you expect to hear. Dr. Smith's goal is to help you make an informed decision that aligns with your career goals and aspirations.

Additionally, don't forget to ask follow-up questions and seek clarification on any points you're unsure about. This will show that you're genuinely interested in his opinions and willing to learn from his expertise.

Here's an example email or message you could send to Dr. Smith:

"Hi Dr. Smith,

I hope this message finds you well. I've been thinking about my career path and considering pursuing an MBA. I was wondering if I could pick your brain about your thoughts on the matter. How do you think an MBA would impact my career, and do you think it's a good time to pursue one?

I'd also love to hear your opinions on the current job market for MBA graduates and if you know of any alumni or professionals in the industry who might be willing to chat with me about their experiences.

Let me know if you're available to chat, and I'd appreciate any guidance you can offer.

Best regards,
[Your Name]"

Good luck, and I hope you have a productive conversation with Dr. Smith!
